Nature.title: Braiding Sweetgrass
Nature.description: A bestselling nonfiction book by Robin Wall Kimmerer that weaves together Indigenous wisdom, scientific knowledge, and the teachings of plants.

Nature.title: The Hidden Life of Trees
Nature.description: Peter Wohlleben reveals the secret world of forests and how trees communicate, care for each other, and live in social networks.

Nature.title: Nature Podcast
Nature.description: The Nature Podcast brings you the best stories from the world of science each week, covering everything from astronomy to zoology.

Nature.title: Forces for Nature
Nature.description: Crystal DiMiceli interviews people working to create a healthier and more humane world, from scientists to young environmental activists.

Nature.title: Planet Earth II
Nature.description: BBC's groundbreaking nature documentary series showcasing the natural world in stunning 4K detail with David Attenborough's narration.

Nature.title: Nature Journaling
Nature.description: Learn to observe and document nature through sketching, writing, and scientific observation in a personal nature journal.

Nature.title: iNaturalist Citizen Science
Nature.description: Join a global community of nature enthusiasts to identify species, contribute to science, and learn about biodiversity.

Science.title: Sapiens
Science.description: Yuval Noah Harari's exploration of how Homo sapiens came to dominate the world through cognitive, agricultural, and scientific revolutions.

Science.title: The Gene: An Intimate History
Science.description: Siddhartha Mukherjee traces the history of genetics from Mendel's experiments to modern gene therapy and CRISPR technology.

Science.title: Radiolab
Science.description: WNYC's Radiolab explores scientific concepts through storytelling, sound design, and philosophical questions about our world.

Science.title: Science Vs
Science.description: Wendy Zukerman pits facts against popular opinion, examining the science behind health trends, conspiracy theories, and debates.

Science.title: MinutePhysics
Science.description: Henry Reich explains complex physics concepts in simple, animated videos that make science accessible to everyone.

Science.title: Veritasium
Science.description: Derek Muller creates engineering and science videos that explore interesting phenomena and counterintuitive results.

Science.title: DIY Science Experiments
Science.description: Hands-on science activities from the Exploratorium that you can do at home with everyday materials.

Science.title: Build a Telescope
Science.description: Learn to build your own telescope and explore astronomy through hands-on construction and observation.

History.title: A People's History of the World
History.description: Chris Harman presents history from the perspective of ordinary people, challenging traditional narratives of power and progress.

History.title: The Silk Roads
History.description: Peter Frankopan reframes world history through the networks of trade routes that connected East and West for millennia.

History.title: Hardcore History
History.description: Dan Carlin's immersive historical narratives bring the past to life through detailed storytelling and unique perspectives.

History.title: Revolutions
History.description: Mike Duncan examines the great political revolutions that have shaped the modern world, from the English Civil War to the Russian Revolution.

History.title: Extra History
History.description: Extra Credits team creates animated educational videos covering fascinating historical events and lesser-known stories.

History.title: Crash Course World History
History.description: John Green presents world history in fast-paced, entertaining episodes that cover major themes and events.

History.title: Historical Reenactment
History.description: Participate in living history programs and historical reenactments to experience the past firsthand.

History.title: Create a Family Timeline
History.description: Research and create a visual timeline of your family's history, connecting personal stories to historical events.

Art.title: Ways of Seeing
Art.description: John Berger's influential work on how we perceive and understand visual culture, art, and the act of seeing itself.

Art.title: The Story of Art
Art.description: E.H. Gombrich's comprehensive and accessible introduction to the history of art from cave paintings to modern times.

Art.title: A Piece of Work
Art.description: WNYC and Abbi Jacobson explore famous artworks, revealing the stories, techniques, and cultural context behind masterpieces.

Art.title: The Modern Art Notes Podcast
Art.description: Tyler Green interviews artists, curators, and art historians about contemporary and modern art, museums, and cultural issues.

Art.title: The Art Assignment
Art.description: Sarah Urist Green explores art history and contemporary art practice, featuring assignments that encourage creative participation.

Art.title: Great Art Explained
Art.description: James Payne breaks down famous paintings and artworks, explaining their historical context, techniques, and cultural significance.

Art.title: Visit Local Art Museums
Art.description: Explore art collections in person at local museums, galleries, and cultural institutions to experience artworks firsthand.

Art.title: Art Journaling
Art.description: Combine visual art with personal reflection through mixed-media journaling, exploring creativity and self-expression.

Tech.title: The Innovators
Tech.description: Walter Isaacson chronicles the history of the digital revolution and the people who created the computer and internet age.

Tech.title: Race After Technology
Tech.description: Ruha Benjamin examines how technology can perpetuate racial bias and inequality, calling for more equitable design practices.

Tech.title: Reply All
Tech.description: Gimlet Media's show about the internet and how it affects our lives, featuring investigations into online culture and digital mysteries.

Tech.title: Darknet Diaries
Tech.description: Jack Rhysider explores the dark side of technology through true stories about hackers, breaches, and cybercrime.

Tech.title: Tom Scott
Tech.description: Tom Scott creates educational videos about technology, science, and interesting places, explaining complex concepts clearly.

Tech.title: Marques Brownlee (MKBHD)
Tech.description: In-depth reviews and explanations of the latest technology, from smartphones to electric vehicles and emerging tech trends.

Tech.title: Learn Coding with FreeCodeCamp
Tech.description: Free online platform to learn programming through interactive lessons, projects, and certifications in web development.

Tech.title: Build Raspberry Pi Projects
Tech.description: Hands-on computer science projects using Raspberry Pi, from basic programming to robotics and IoT applications.

Personal Development.title: Atomic Habits
Personal Development.description: James Clear's practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones through small, incremental changes.

Personal Development.title: Mindset: The New Psychology of Success
Personal Development.description: Carol Dweck explores how our beliefs about our abilities affect our success and how to develop a growth mindset.

Personal Development.title: The Life Coach School Podcast
Personal Development.description: Brooke Castillo teaches practical tools for personal development, emotional management, and creating the life you want.

Personal Development.title: The Tim Ferriss Show
Personal Development.description: Tim Ferriss interviews world-class performers to deconstruct their routines, habits, and tactics for success.

Personal Development.title: TEDx Talks
Personal Development.description: Inspirational talks from entrepreneurs, thought leaders, and innovators sharing ideas worth spreading.

Personal Development.title: School of Life
Personal Development.description: Philosophy and psychology videos exploring emotional intelligence, relationships, work, and finding meaning in life.

Personal Development.title: 30-Day Challenge
Personal Development.description: Choose from various 30-day personal development challenges to build new habits and expand your comfort zone.

Personal Development.title: Journaling Practice
Personal Development.description: Develop a daily journaling practice for self-reflection, goal setting, and personal growth tracking.

Fitness.title: Becoming a Supple Leopard
Fitness.description: Kelly Starrett's comprehensive guide to movement, mobility, and performance optimization.

Fitness.title: Starting Strength
Fitness.description: Mark Rippetoe's definitive guide to basic barbell training and strength development.

Fitness.title: The Ben Greenfield Life
Fitness.description: Biohacking, fitness, nutrition, and longevity insights from Ben Greenfield.

Fitness.title: Mind Pump
Fitness.description: Raw fitness and nutrition insights from Sal, Adam, and Justin.

Fitness.title: AthleanX Full Body Workout
Fitness.description: Complete full-body workout routine from Jeff Cavaliere's AthleanX channel.

Fitness.title: Yoga with Adriene - 30 Day Challenge
Fitness.description: Free 30-day yoga challenge for all levels with Adriene Mishler.

Fitness.title: Local Hiking Trail Exploration
Fitness.description: Discover and explore hiking trails in your area using AllTrails app.

Fitness.title: Rock Climbing at Local Gym
Fitness.description: Indoor rock climbing for strength, problem-solving, and community.

Cooking.title: Salt, Fat, Acid, Heat
Cooking.description: Samin Nosrat's guide to mastering the four fundamental elements of good cooking.

Cooking.title: The Food Lab
Cooking.description: J. Kenji López-Alt's scientific approach to home cooking with detailed explanations.

Cooking.title: The Splendid Table
Cooking.description: NPR's award-winning food show with recipes, cooking tips, and food culture.

Cooking.title: The Dave Chang Show
Cooking.description: Chef David Chang discusses food, culture, and life with various guests.

Cooking.title: Bon Appétit Test Kitchen
Cooking.description: Professional chefs demonstrate techniques and create recipes in Bon Appétit's test kitchen.

Cooking.title: Joshua Weissman Cooking Videos
Cooking.description: Home cooking techniques and recipes from chef Joshua Weissman.

Cooking.title: Local Farmers Market Visit
Cooking.description: Explore local farmers markets for fresh, seasonal ingredients and cooking inspiration.

Cooking.title: Cooking Class at Local Culinary School
Cooking.description: Hands-on cooking classes to learn new techniques and cuisines.

Travel.title: A Walk in the Woods
Travel.description: Bill Bryson's humorous account of hiking the Appalachian Trail.

Travel.title: Wild
Travel.description: Cheryl Strayed's memoir of self-discovery while hiking the Pacific Crest Trail.

Travel.title: Travel with Rick Steves
Travel.description: Travel tips, cultural insights, and destination guides from Rick Steves.

Travel.title: Zero To Travel
Travel.description: Travel stories and tips for budget travelers and digital nomads.

Travel.title: Kara and Nate Travel Vlogs
Travel.description: Travel couple documenting their journey to visit 100 countries.

Travel.title: Drew Binsky Travel Videos
Travel.description: Travel documentaries and cultural explorations from around the world.

Travel.title: Local Photography Walk
Travel.description: Join local photography groups to explore your city with a travel mindset.

Travel.title: Weekend Road Trip Planning
Travel.description: Plan and execute local road trips to explore nearby destinations.

Mindfulness & Meditation.title: The Power of Now
Mindfulness & Meditation.description: Eckhart Tolle's guide to spiritual enlightenment through present-moment awareness.

Mindfulness & Meditation.title: Wherever You Go, There You Are
Mindfulness & Meditation.description: Jon Kabat-Zinn's practical guide to mindfulness meditation in everyday life.

Mindfulness & Meditation.title: On Being with Krista Tippett
Mindfulness & Meditation.description: Thoughtful conversations about life, spirituality, and what it means to be human.

Mindfulness & Meditation.title: Ten Percent Happier with Dan Harris
Mindfulness & Meditation.description: Meditation and mindfulness advice from Dan Harris and expert guests.

Mindfulness & Meditation.title: Headspace Guided Meditations
Mindfulness & Meditation.description: Short guided meditation videos from the Headspace team.

Mindfulness & Meditation.title: The Honest Guys Meditation
Mindfulness & Meditation.description: Relaxation and meditation videos for sleep, stress relief, and mindfulness.

Mindfulness & Meditation.title: Local Meditation Group
Mindfulness & Meditation.description: Join local meditation groups for community practice and support.

Mindfulness & Meditation.title: Nature Walking Meditation
